name: Zombie Apocalypse (itch) (Calvin Art Games)
description:
Zombie Apocalypse

Hello, welcome to this game.

Yeah, this is my fist game on itch, so I guess its just a test. You play as a blocky square guy and you have to dodge or shoot the zombies that attack you.

Use the arrow keys or wasd to move, aim with your mouse pointer and click to fire your gun. Its pretty simple tbh. 

Avoid cars; they will kill you.

Thanks for playing and have fun :)
